summary:
Addon for WARZONES CIVIL UNREST, tired of seeing the standard ranks of forsworn in warzones?
This mod changes that! Forsworn Looters, Foragers, Ravagers, Pillagers, Warlords and Briarhearts can now be encountered on the battlefield!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.majhost.com/gallery/Slasher/Crap/warzones_forsworn_variation_render.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000]This mod is very old and might not even work anymore! I do not plan to update the mod since I simply do not have any motivation left to do so.. :([/color]
You can however review the esp file with the creation kit and see how it is done. It isn't that hard to make edits, it doesn't require you to be an experienced modder! :)

-DESCRIPTION-

[color=orange] Addon for WARZONES CIVIL UNREST, tired of seeing the standard ranks of forsworn in warzones?
This mod changes that! Forsworn Looters, Foragers, Ravagers, Pillagers, Warlords and Briarhearts can now be encountered on the battlefield!

Don't worry, you won't encounter Forsworn Warlords at lvl 1, they will be included in the spawn list when you reach lvl 30. Same counts for other forsworn ranks at different player lvls.

Normally you would never encounter an forsworn mage in a warzone, now you can with roughly chance of 20%

This mod REQUIRES [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9494]Warzones Civil Unrest[/url] by MyGoodEye![/color]

-INSTALLATION-

[color=orange]I recommend installation using Nexus Mod Manager.
If you like the mod, an endorsement is welcome :) make sure you endorse MyGoodEye mod too if you haven't done so![/color]

-COMPATIBILITY-

[color=orange]Compatible with all other WARZONES mods, if your game crashes it is unlikely it is caused by this mod, I would suggest to look through the F.A.Q. section of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9494]Warzones Civil Unrest[/url][/color]

-CHANGE LOG-

[color=orange]V1 Release 09-01-2012
- removed forsworn level scaling
- added different forsworn ranks in spawnlist (looters, ravagers, etc.)[/color]

-CREDITS-

[color=orange][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1538812]MyGoodEye[/url] for making Warzones Civil Unrest, Also the inspiration for the renders.[/color]
author: Slasher7
